com.bmc.arsys.api

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.ApiConfig
      • com.bmc.arsys.api.Config
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiConfigI, ApiPropertyI

    public class Config
extends ApiConfig
    This is Singleton class, which is used to capture configuration details for the Java API.
